caption.p: Maps of China, based on 15,539 0.25° grid cells, showing, for January–February 2020, (a) cell-densities of COVID-19 cases, (b) population density, (c) maximum temperature, (d) minimum temperature, (e) solar radiation and (f) precipitation. Maps (b–f) show the 559 cells having at least one case in red (these maps are approximate representations of national borders).
